title: Neon Dream GO SMS Pro Theme
creator: Sacred Geometry

extendedInfo.description: If you enjoy this theme, please take a few seconds to rate it! It really helps, thanks!In supporting my creation of themes, apps, and beyond, please note that this theme comes with one or more of the following: Airpush/LeadBolt/SendDroid, which periodically displays ads in the notification bar. Also, a small number of icons will be presented on your phone's desktop, which can simply be deleted. (Hence the permissions.) Again, this helps support me in the evolutionary creation process of themes, apps, music and more. You can always download a free Airpush blocker from Google Play, download the donation version which is free of ads ( https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jb.gosms.webtheme.neondream.donate ), and/or send me musical instruments. Your support and feedbackare appreciated!:)To get a donation version theme for free, like Sacred Geometry Creations on Facebook! Thank you!:(https://www.facebook.com/sacredgeometrycreations">https://www.facebook.com/sacredgeometrycreations)This is a theme for GO SMS Pro (a great free text messaging (and much more) app to replace the stock Android SMS).You must have GO SMS Pro installed first to download and use this theme.You may get it here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jb.gosmsIf this theme is not working, it may be due to you having the Jellybean version of Android on your phone. E-mail me, and I may be able to help you get it functioning.Like bright neon colors (such as pink, purple, sun amethyst, fuchsia, lilac, rose, lavender, carnation, sunshine yellow, lemon yellow, citrus orange, persimmon orange, green-yellow and green) dance parties, glowing lights, colors that glow under a black-light, strobing strobe lights, lucid dreaming and organic all-natural cotton candy? Love love? I'm guessing you'll like this Neon Dream GO SMS Pro theme. Still using the stock Android SMS? Upgrade your SMS and MMS experience with GO SMS Pro, then personalize it with this Neon Dream GO SMS Pro theme. Colorful bright neon expression full of features, this theme brought to you by Sacred Geometry Creations. A happy colorful vibrant dance party whenever you send or receive a text message or multimedia message, or interact with text messages and multimedia messages. If you enjoy this Neon Dream GO SMS Pro theme, please rate it in Google Play, like Sacred Geometry Creations on Facebook (https://goo.gl/1zVST">www.facebook.com/sacredgeometrycreations), and check out more of our GO SMS Pro themes and other fun creations at https://goo.gl/ZlNNu">www.SacredGeometryCreations.com! Thank you!Neon dream highlighter dance party in the glowing swirling bright vibrant rainbow of colors organic cotton candyStartapp's required disclaimer. Thanks for your support!:"We love creating apps, and want to keep them free forever. In order to keep our development running we are using a search service to generate some revenue from this free app. This app will add a couple search links on your device in the form of an icon, bookmark link and browser homepage. You may delete them easily (drag to the trash or delete the link for the browser), if you choose to use them, thanks!"
